avatar.description: Gets a user's avatar (or your own).

choose.description: Picks out of a series of options (comma separated).
choose.comma: The options need to be a comma-separated list! For example: `peaches, pears, apples, ...etc`

invite.description: Generates an invite for the channel if possible.

role.description: Applies or removes a role from the user.

serverinfo.description: Gets the info for the server.

topic.description: Changes the topic of the channel you're in.

vote.description: Creates a poll for people to vote on.
